summary: Branch Manager and Floral Designer with extensive experience in sales leadership, customer service, team development, and operations. Proven ability to exceed sales goals, manage budgets, oversee inventory, and deliver high-quality service. Bilingual (English/Spanish) with strong problem solving, multitasking, and time management skills.

experience.title: Branch Manager/Floral Designer
experience.description: Managed a wide variety of customer service and administrative tasks to resolve issues. Ensured superior customer experience by addressing concerns, empathy, and on-the-spot problem resolution. Shared best practices for sales and service; stocked and replenished merchandise; maintained merchandising standards; fostered a positive work environment; cultivated a customer-focused shopping environment; communicated clear expectations; worked with management to allocate responsibilities; pursued personal learning and development; supervised merchandise and shipment processing; reduced and controlled expenses by preparing a daily purchasing budget.

experience.title: Bi-Lingual Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Assisted Spanish-speaking customers with medication orders and refills; verified insurance benefits; explained benefits to ensure lawful operation. Worked in a production-based environment with quotas; performed data entry, problem solving, critical thinking, and interpersonal tasks; processed credit card payments over the phone for out-of-pocket payments; handled coverage/lack of availability issues.

experience.title: Customer Service Representative
experience.description: Assisted with verification of insurance benefits; data entry; acted as patient advocate while assisting case managers with daily caseload in a production-based environment; made outbound and inbound calls to doctors, pharmacies, providers, and patients to obtain benefits, referrals, and authorizations; ensured promised activities were completed to satisfy patients; emphasized organization and problem-solving.

experience.title: Customer Care Specialist
experience.description: Call-center environment handling 200+ calls per day in a fast-paced setting; performance measured by metrics; assisted Medicare customers by reviewing requests for providers and plans regarding authorization requirements and prescription coverage; navigated PA Hub and Argus to resolve medication access issues; processed Excel grids for Caremark Specialty Pharmacy; ran pharmacy claims in CAS and trained new employees on CCP2 system.

experience.title: Floral Designer/Sales
experience.description: Designed daily floral arrangements; assisted customers in selecting products; prepared accurate cash reports and opened/closed the facility multiple times; sales were commission-based; provided customer service and problem solving to ensure customer satisfaction and repeat business.

certifications: Certificate of Completion in Business and Managerial Skills (AAFET program)
